name: Thanos Poulitsas
body:
### Profile
A caveman PHP web developer swinging his bat mostly on the amazing FuelPHP framework, with a strong background in various areas such as Javascript, Coffeescript, Java, HTML5, CSS3, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis and other cool stuff with fancy logos.

### Recent works
* [eCharta](https://www.echarta.com) - Online auction platform for paper enthusiasts
* [#tutorpool](http://www.tutorpool.gr) - Network of volunteerism and solidarity for education

### Don't be shy!
Say hello at thpoul@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
